title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Berlin Tempelhof - version 1
description:
In this addon spotlight we are going to look at Berlin Tempelhof Airport (EDDI) version 1.0 which has been released a few days ago. This addon has been created by a community member and adds the closed airport to MSFS 2020. Berlin Tempelhof was an operational airport until 2008 after which it was converted to a public park. But in Flight Simulator 2020 everything is possible even opening an old airport. 

If you want to give the airport a try yourself you can download it from the site below: 
https://flightsim.to/file/19112/berlin-tempelhof-airport-eddi
